formDefaultsGrid.formDefaultsGridDescription: Resets button action to false so emailAddressPanel is hidden upon form opening
Sets selected email subject dropdown to blank so dropdown on-change will execute do block
Default title for all internal attendee meetings

formDefaultsGrid.formDefaultsGridValue: Hi, please join me for this meeting to discuss...
formDefaultsGrid.formDefaultsGridDescription: Default description for all internal attendee meetings
Default email subject when arranging a meeting with external attendees
Reset select meeting dropdown for internal emetings
By default, create a draft instead of sending the email when there are external participants

settingsGrid.settingsGridDescription: Name of the automation project. This will appear in the Forms.
URL link to the automation's user guide. Must start with http:// or https:// Example: https://www.google.com

settingsGrid.settingsGridValue: This automation allows you to enter a set of emails and find an ideal meeting time for all attendees.
settingsGrid.settingsGridDescription: Automation description to appear in the Form activity at runtime.
Prepopulate the email address that errors should be sent to if the user chooses to send an email in the event of an error.
If you're using queues, this is the Orchestrator queue Name. The value must match with the queue name defined on Orchestrator.

constantsGrid.constantsGridDescription: Title for the User Inputs and Results Forms
Must be 0 if working with Orchestrator queues. If > 0, the robot will retry the same transaction which failed with a system exception. Must be an integer value.
The number of consecutive system exceptions allowed. If MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions is reached, the job is stopped. To disable this feature, set the value to 0.
Where to save exceptions screenshots - can be a full or a relative path.
Static part of logging message. Calling Get Transaction Data.

constantsGrid.constantsGridValue: Error getting transaction data for Transaction Number:
constantsGrid.constantsGridDescription: Static part of logging message. Error retrieving Transaction Data.
Static part of logging message. Processed Transaction succesful.
Static part of logging message. Processed Transaction failed with business exception.
Static part of logging message. Processed Transaction failed with application exception.

constantsGrid.constantsGridValue: The maximum number of consecutive system exceptions was reached.
constantsGrid.constantsGridDescription: Error message in case MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions number is reached.
The number of times Get Transaction Item activity is retried in case of an exception. Must be an integer >= 1.
The number of times Set transaction status activity is retried in case of an exception. Must be an integer >= 1.
Must be TRUE or FALSE. If the value is TRUE and an error occurs in Initialization state or the MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions is reached, the job is marked as Faulted.
